main {
  0B0;
  0b1;
  0b1000;
  0B00000000000000000000000000000000;
  0b11111111111111111111111111111111 as u32;

  1;
  2;
  2147483647;
  9223372036854775808 as u64;

  0X0;
  0x9;
  0XA;
  0xf;
  0X9999999;
  0xFFFFFFFF as u32;

  0O0;
  0o7;
  0O0000000000;
  0o7777777777 as u32;
}
===== code =====
#include <stdint.h>
int main (void) {
  0B0;
  0b1;
  0b1000;
  0B00000000000000000000000000000000;
  (uint32_t) 0b11111111111111111111111111111111;
  1;
  2;
  2147483647;
  (uint64_t) 9223372036854775808U;
  0X0;
  0x9;
  0XA;
  0xf;
  0X9999999;
  (uint32_t) 0xFFFFFFFF;
  00;
  07;
  00000000000;
  (uint32_t) 07777777777;
}
===== output =====
